quests.text: Before praying today, pause for 1 second and check your intention. Are you praying for Allah?
Ask someone you trust one question about Islam that you've been wondering about.
Read a Surah from the Qur'an (even a short one) and think about its meaning.
Do one kind deed for someone without telling anyone else about it.
Make dua for someone who has wronged you or been difficult to deal with.
Thank Allah out loud for three specific blessings you often take for granted.
Pray Sunnah prayers before or after one of your obligatory prayers today.
Memorize the meaning of one verse from the Qur'an that you already know.
Say something kind to a family member, even if you don't feel like it.
Fast from backbiting and gossip for the entire dayâ€”speak only good or remain silent.
Give charity, even if it's just a small amount. Every act counts.
Seek forgiveness from Allah sincerely for something specific you regret.
Lower your gaze when you're tempted to look at something inappropriate.
Listen to or read a reminder about death and the Hereafter.
Reflect on one hadith or Qur'an verse and write one sentence about how it applies to your life.
Help someone with a task without expecting anything in return.
Perform wudu with focus and mindfulness, knowing it washes away sins.
Make the intention to speak the truth today, even when it's difficult.
Smile at someone as an act of charity.
Teach someone younger than you something beneficial about Islam.
